Articles.Content: Follow Hypers set your aimst at 450 pages! HYYYYYYYYYYYYPE!
This is as close to a religious experience as I'll ever be
502's are what happen when Hype hits the fan.

> 
> She's packing quite a wallop... Shields weakening!

Auxillary hype to the shields! EMERGENCY hype to the shields!~kl;sdjfaksdja;sd
And the german passengers onboard.. its 6pm..time for some kerbing! #Hypetrain!
Ok, now we know why they never give us release dates. Because we shut everything down with HYPE!
Biggest amount of hype i have ever seen
Come on boys! I've got my stock of nachos, beer etc. I'm here for the long haul!!

> 
> Resistance is futile, you will be HYPEd!

Moar HYPE! Assimilate it all!

"Picked up a wispier near Tylo"

Kortanna- A kerbal AI
